mapper.select: SELECT t2.*,t2.id as 'key' FROM t_purchase_list t1 ,t_purchase_goods t2 WHERE t1.purchasesn = t2.purchasesn and t1.userCode=#{userCode} and t1.purchasesn =#{purchasesn} ORDER BY id desc
SELECT t2.*,t2.id as 'key' FROM t_purchase_list t1 ,t_purchase_goods t2 WHERE t1.purchasesn = t2.purchasesn and stage='9' and t1.purchasesn =#{purchasesn} ORDER BY id desc
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_purchase_list
stage=#{stage},
status=#{status},
goodsnames=#{goodsnames},
sendtype=#{sendtype},
address=#{address},
deliverytime=#{deliverytime},
currency=#{currency},
remark=#{remark},
waybillno=#{waybillno},
waybillremark=#{waybillremark},
waybillfee=#{waybillfee},
WHERE purchasesn=#{purchasesn}

update t_purchase_goods
expectprice=#{expectprice},
realprice=#{realprice},
total=#{total},
costprice=#{costprice},
otherprice=#{otherprice},
supplierid=#{supplierid},
barcode=#{barcode},
deliverytype=#{deliverytype},
goodsname=#{goodsname},
goodsid=#{goodsid},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.*,t2.sum FROM t_purchase_goods t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.purchasesn, SUM(t.realprice) sum FROM t_purchase_goods t WHERE t.purchasesn=#{purchasesn}) t2 ON t1.purchasesn=t2.purchasesn WHERE t1.purchasesn=#{purchasesn} ORDER BY t1.goodsname desc
SELECT t1.*,t2.typename as sendtypename FROM t_purchase_list t1 ,t_base_sendtype t2 WHERE t1.sendtype = t2.id AND t1.purchasesn=#{purchasesn}
SELECT t.* FROM t_purchase_goods t WHERE t.purchasesn=#{purchasesn} ORDER BY t.goodsname desc
